Về Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

Nhiệm vụ của Quỹ vì Phụ Nữ Nghèo Thanh Hóa (FPW) là cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính bền vững cho những người phụ nữ kém may mắn ở các vùng nông thôn tỉnh Thanh Hóa.


*Lưu ý: Để phát huy tối đa hiệu quả & giảm chi phí, khoản vay này đã được thông báo bằng biểu mẫu để có thể được Kiva tự động biên dịch. .  Do việc biên dịch thủ công các danh mục rất tốn kém, nên Kiva đã tạo biểu mẫu này cho phần Field Partner (Trường Đối Tác) cho phép họ tiếp tục thông báo các khoản vay bằng  Vietnamese trong khi cung cấp thông tin có chất lượng & chính xác cho người cho vay Kiva.  ."

loans.use: To purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in the future

loans.name: Cesar Eliseo

texts.es:
Cesar Eliseo es un padre de familia de 66 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa en una zona marginal de la ciudad de Chiclayo, la capital de la región Lambayeque. La zona en donde reside se encuentra poblada principalmente por familias humildes que dependen de trabajos relacionados a la construcción y comercio para poder subsistir.

Cesar posee un taller de renovación de calzado que viene funcionando en la zona desde hace catorce años. Su taller se encuentra situado en una zona bastante concurrida de su localidad y su clientela es bastante fiel, ya que siempre quedan satisfechos con el servicio de brinda. El negocio le sirve para solventar los gastos económicos de su familia y sacarlos adelante.

Cesar desea adquirir algunos repuestos y herramientas que necesita para brindar un mejor servicio, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles con los cuales planea lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Cesar Eliseo is a 66 year old head family man who lives with his wife in a marginal area of the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.  Residents of the area where he lives are primarily humble families who depend on construction work and small business to survive.

Cesar has a shoe repair shop that has been in the area for 14 years.  His shop is located in a fairly busy part of town and he has a loyal clientele, as they are always satisfied with the service he provides.  His business supports his family and helps them to get ahead. 

Cesar wants to purchase replacement parts and tools that he needs to provide better service.  For this reason he has come to Edpyme Alternativa to request a loan of 500 nuevos soles which he plans to use for this purpose.

loans.use: Purchase replacement parts and tools that he needs to provide better service.

loans.name: Walter Santos

texts.es:
Walter es un padre de familia de 41 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos en el Caserío Santa Clara, una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Pítipo, su actividad principal es la agricultura y sus pobladores son gente humilde y bastante trabajadora. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Ferreñafe, a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclyo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años a trabajar en actividades relacionadas con la producción agrícola. El cría animales menores en su domicilio y adicionalmente siembra cereales y hortalizas. Tanto los animales como la producción de sus cultivos son vendidas en el mercado Moshoqueque (mercado mayorista) de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Los ingresos que le brindan estas actividades le sirven para ayudar su familia a solventar sus gastos y sacarlos adelante.

Walter desea brindar mantenimiento a sus cultivos de yuca y pallar que tiene instalados actualmente, para ello ha creído necesario solicitar un crédito de 500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa, los cuales planea invertir en la adquisición de abonos.
texts.en:
Walter is a 41 year old father who lives with his wife and two children in the village of Santa Clara, a rural area located in the Pítipo district.  The main economic activity is agriculture and residents are humble, hardworking people.  The area is located in the Ferreñafe province, more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

Walter has worked in agricultural activities for ten years.  He raises small animals at home and he also plants grains and vegetables. He sells both his animals and his crops in the Moshoqueque wholesale market in the city of Chiclayo.  His income from these activities supports his family and helps them to get ahead. 

Walter wants to care for his yucca and lima bean crops which are currently planted.  For this reason he has requested a loan of 500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which he will use to purchase fertilizer.

loans.use: Care for his yucca and lima bean crops.

loans.name: María Leonor

texts.es:
Maria Leonor tiene 61 años de edad, es separada y reside en un sector marginal del distrito de Chiclayo, la capital de la región Lambayeque, es una zona bastante conocida a nivel nacional por su abundante movimiento comercial y de  trasporte.

Se dedica a la comercialización de condimentos y especias en un puesto situado en el mercado 9 de Octubre, ella ya tiene más de quince años dedicándose a esta actividad y durante este tiempo ha podido obtener una clientela estable y fidelizada, la cual prefiere los productos de buena calidad y el buen trato que ofrece. María se ha valido de esta labor para salir adelante y mantenerse activa durante todo este tiempo. 

Actualmente ella desea surtir su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y aumentar su nivel de ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles, con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
María Leonor is 61 years old.  She is separated and lives in a poor sector of Chiclayo district, the capital of Lambayeque region.  This is an area that is quite well-known nationally for its bustling commercial and transport activity.

María sells condiments and spices on a stall in the 9 de Octubre market.  She has been in this business for more than fifteen years and over the years she has attracted a stable and loyal customer base who like the good-quality products and good customer service that she offers.

María has used her work to get ahead in life and remain active all this time.  She would currently like to stock her business by purchasing more products so that she can meet her customers' demands and increase her sales levels.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will enable her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To buy more products so that she can meet her customers' demands and increase her sales levels

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa Elvira es una madre de familia de 28 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a su hijo en edad escolar, su familia reside en el distrito de Picsi, una zona predominantemente agrícola que se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la elaboración de objetos decorativos bajo la técnica de cerámica en frío, ella fabrica toda clase de adornos y los ofrece en venta a los pobladores de la zona en base a pedidos. Adicionalmente también fabrica productos por su cuenta, los cuales también ofrece en venta. El negocio ya tiene seis años funcionando y durante este tiempo se ha valido de los ingresos que le brinda para apoyar a su esposo, quien es obrero de construcción, con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia

Actualmente Rosa cuenta cada vez con más pedidos, para poder satisfacer su demanda, ha creído conveniente adquirir más material de modo que pueda ampliar su producción y sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a  Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su meta.
texts.en:
Rosa Elvira is a 28 year-old mother who lives together with her husband and school-age son.  Her family live in Picsi district, a predominantly agricultural area which is located twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Rosa makes decorative ceramic objects.  She makes all kinds of decorations to order and sells them to residents of her area.  She also makes products on her own initiative and offers them for sale too.  She has been in her business for six years and during this time she has used the income she makes to support her husband, who is a construction worker, with their family finances.

Currently, Rosa is receiving more and more orders.  In order to meet demand, she has decided to acquire more material so that she can expand her production and increase her sales.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will enable her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To acquire more material so that she can expand her production and increase her sales

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto tiene 44 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en  el distrito de Pátapo, una zona predominantemente agrícola que produce principalmente caña de azúcar y sus derivados, se encuentra ubicada a cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de alimentos, golosinas y bebidas gaseosas en quioscos, el ya lleva tres años en el negocio y actualmente se vale de el para solventar los gastos de su familia. Su esposa le apoya en esta actividad y actualmente cuenta con dos quioscos: el primero se encuentra ubicado en una escuela de la zona y el segundo frente a su domicilio. Ambos establecimientos cuentan con bastante acogida y le han servido durante todo este tiempo para salir adelante.

Carlos desea adquirir insumos para preparar comida y venderla por las noches en el quiosco que se encuentra ubicado frente a su domicilio, ya que, debido a la temporada de vacaciones escolares, el número de clientes del quiosco situado en la escuela ha disminuido. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles. Con el dinero del préstamo el tiene pensado preparar papas rellenas, salchipapas y hamburguesas.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is 44 years old, married and lives with his wife and children in the district of Pátapo, a predominantly agricultural area that produces principally sugarcane and its products. It is located 45 minutes outside of the city of Chiclayo.

He sells food, sweets and sodas in kiosks. He has been in this business for three years, and it is currently enough to cover the family expenses. His wife supports him in this activity, and he currently has two kiosks. The first is located in a school zone and the second is across from his house. Both establishments been received well and have served him all this time to get ahead.

Carlos wishes to acquire supplies to prepare food and sell it at night from the kiosk across from his house since, due to school vacation, the number of customers to his kiosk by the school has diminished. To achieve this objective, he needed to seek a loan of 1500 New Peruvian Soles with Edpyme Alternativa. With the money from the loan, he plans to prepare stuffed potatoes, salchipapas (sausage mixed with french fries) and hamburgers.

loans.use: To buy supplies to prepare food and sell it at night

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando es un padre de familia de 60 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa en el sector La Esperanza, una zona rural que se dedica principalmente a labores agrícolas, pertenece al distrito de Reque y se encuentra ubicada a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace veinticinco años a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí el ofrece a sus clientes productos de buena calidad brindando siempre un trato amable y servicial. Su clientela es estable y el siempre trata de mantener su negocio de la mejor manera posible ya que de ello depende el sustento de su familia.

Orlando desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más mercadería de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes durante la temporada de fiestas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de más productos para ampliar su negocio.
texts.en: Orlando is a 60 year-old father who lives with his wife in the La Esperanza sector, a rural area primarily focused on agricultural production. La Esperanza sector belongs to the district of Reque and is located half an hour from the city of Chiclayo. For the last 25 years, Orlando has worked selling staple products and groceries in a bodega located in his house. He offers his customers high-quality products and provides friendly and helpful service. He has a stable clientele and always tries to maintain his business in the best possible way because his family depends on the store for its livelihood. Orlando would like to expand his business by acquiring more merchandise so that he can satisfy the demands of his customers during the holiday season. For this reason, he decided to request a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa. He plans to invest this loan in the purchase of more products to expand his business.

loans.use: to expand his business by purchasing more merchandise, in order to satisfy the demands of his customers

loans.name: Rosa Lily

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 47 años de edad, es separada y reside junto a su familia en el sector San Luis, una zona rural que tiene como principales actividades económicas a la agricultura y al comercio, se encuentra situada en el distrito de La Victoria, a quince minutos del distrito de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores: patos, pavos, gallinas y ovejas en algunos corrales situados en su domicilio. Los engorda para venderlos mensualmente en la ciudad de Chiclayo. Adicionalmente cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio en donde ofrece a sus clientes diversos productos de uso diario entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para mantenerse activa y sacar adelante a su familia.

Rosa desea incrementar su stock de animales para poder aumentar sus ventas durante estas fiestas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de animales menores y alimento balanceado.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 47, is separated from her husband and lives with her family in the area of San Luis, a rural area where the main economic activities are agriculture and trading. It is located in a district called La Victoria, 15 minutes from Chiclayo district.

Rosa dedicates her time to raising and selling small animals: ducks, turkeys, chickens and sheep, which she keeps in different pens outside her home. She fattens them up to sell each month in the city of Chiclayo. She also has a small store in her house, where she can offer her customers a range of household necessities and groceries. She uses the income she makes from this to keep herself active and bring up her family. 

Rosa wants to increase her stock of animals so as to increase her sales over the festive season, and believes that seeking a loan from [field partner] Edpyme Alternativa is the best way to do so. She is seeking a loan of 2,000 Soles, which she plans to invest in buying small animals and animal feed.

loans.use: To increase her stock of animals to be able to increase her sales during the festive season.

loans.name: Betty Elizabeth

texts.es:
Betty tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a sus padres en el caserío Caracucho, un zona rural del distrito de Mórrope, lugar caracterizado por tener a la mayoría de su población concentrada en pequeños caseríos dispersos, la zona pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Betty se dedica a trabajar como confeccionista de faldas, vestidos y blusas desde hace mas de dos años, cuenta con una máquina de coser en su vivienda donde trabaja constantemente para confeccionar las prendas de vestir que le solicita un comerciante que, a su vez, las vende en algunas ciudades de la sierra del país. Adicionalmente también ofrece en venta las prendas de vestir a sus vecinos. Esta actividad también le ayuda a sentirse activa, por lo que ella gusta mucho de la labor que realiza. Con las ganancias que ella percibe de esta actividad ayuda a sus padres a solventar la economía de su familia.

Betty desea ampliar la producción de su negocio, de modo que pueda ampliar sus ventas y percibir mayores ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente comprar más material de modo que pueda lograr su objetivo. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales pueda realizar esta acción.

Ella ya ha tenido un crédito financiado por el Fondo Kiva a través de Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. En aquella oportunidad ella pudo invertir el dinero de su préstamo en más material con lo cual pudo ampliar su producción y sus ventas y gracias a ello su negocio pudo tomar un impulso para desarrollarse. Ella agradece mucho a las personas que colaboraron con ella en aquella oportunidad y le desean todo tipo de parabienes.
texts.en: Betty is 25 years old, single, and lives with her parents in the hamlet of Caracucho, a rural zone in the district of Mórrope. Mórrope district is characterized by having the majority of its population concentrated in small, scattered hamlets. The zone is part of Lambayeque province and is located one hour from the city of Chiclayo. Betty has worked for more than two years as a seamstress of skirts, dresses, and blouses. She has a sewing machine in her house where she works constantly making the garments requested by a merchant who then sells them in certain cities in the mountainous region of the country. She also offers her garments for sale to her neighbors. Her business makes her feel productive because she really enjoys the work she performs. She uses the income she earns to help her parents meet their family's economic needs. Betty would like to expand her production so that she can increase her sales and improve her earnings. In order to do this, she decided to request a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She has previously received a loan funded through Kiva, which was administered by Edpyme Alternativa through their "Capital Semilla" ["Seed Capital"] program. Thanks to that loan, she was able to expand her production and sales and her business had the momentum to develop. Betty is very thankful to the people who collaborated with her to provide that opportunity and she wishes them all the best.

loans.use: to buy more material to increase her production of clothing items

loans.name: María Francisca

texts.es:
María Francisca tiene 28 años de edad, es separada y reside junto a sus tres hijos en el sector San Antonio de Padua, uno de los anexos que conforman el caserío Punto 9, zona agrícola de pobladores humildes y trabajadores que pertenece al distrito de Mochumí y que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la comercialización de animales menores, ella cría los animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio, los engorda alimentándolos con granos y pastos naturales y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside y al público en general en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Esta actividad es su única fuente de ingresos por lo que ella desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales y alimento balanceado, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le permitan lograr su objetivo y sacar adelante su negocio.
texts.en:
María Francisca is 28 years old.  She is separated and lives with her three children in San Antonio de Padua sector, one of the annexes that make up the village of Punto 9, an agricultural area of humble and hard-working people which is located in Mochumí district, in Lambayeque region, more than twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

María sells animals which she raises in an area behind her home.  She fattens them, feeding them grain and natural fodder, and when they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale to the traders who usually visit the area where she lives and also to the general public in the wholesale market in the city of Chiclayo.

This is María's only source of income which is why she would like to expand her business by purchasing more animals and balanced animal feed.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will enable her to achieve her goal and make progress in her business.

loans.use: To buy more animals and balanced animal feed

loans.name: Leydy Vanessa

texts.es:
Leydy  tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres en el caserío Simbilá, una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Catacaos, provincia de Piura, ubicado en la región del mismo nombre, la zona se encuentra a tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores relacionadas a la agricultura y al comercio. Por un lado ella cuenta con un pequeño establecimiento en su domicilio en donde ofrece en venta diversas frutas de estación a sus vecinos y adicionalmente cría aves de corral para venderlas en el mercado de la ciudad de Piura. Estas actividades le ayudan a mantenerse activa y a apoyar a la economía de su familia.

Leydy desea adquirir más frutas de estación y alimento para sus animales de modo que pueda ampliar sus ventas y percibir mayores ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a realizar esta acción.
texts.en:
Leydy is 22 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in the village of Simbilá, in a rural area of Catacaos district which is located in Piura province and department.  The area is located three hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Leydy works in agriculture and commerce.  She has a small establishment in her home where she sells a range of seasonal fruit to her neighbors.  She also raises poultry to sell in Piura market.  These businesses help keep her active and help her to support her family financially.

Leydy would like to acquire more seasonal fruit and feed for her animals so that she can expand her sales and make more income.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will help her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To acquire more seasonal fruit and feed for her animals

loans.name: 25 Thieu Duong Thieu Hoa Group

texts.en:
Hop D. T. (12) is a 26-year-old femaL. living in the town of Thieu D. Thieu Hoa Thanh Hoa.  Hop is the group leader of a three-member group loan offered by Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  WhiL. each member of the group receives an individual loan, they all are responsibL. for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults.  The official name of this borrowing group is 25 Thieu D. Thieu Hoa (02.09.25 Thieu Hoa).


Hop is married and has one infant-aged child.  To make a living, Hop operates a family member's business raising cattL. for saL..  Hop has been engaged in this business for over five years and earns approximately 2,500,000 VND a month from these activities.


In 2010, Hop joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  Hop is requesting for the first time a loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  She is now requesting a new loan of 5,787,900 VND, which will be used to purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in the future.  The loan will be the 12th loan taken out by Hop from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Hop plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business.


About the Other Borrowers in the Group:



1.  T. T. Hoa (11) is a 39-year-old femaL. who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


2.  L. T. Hoa (13) is a 26-year-old femaL. who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


About Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

The mission of Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW) is to provide sustainabL. financial services to disadvantaged women in rural areas in the Thanh Hoa province.


*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in Vietnamese whiL. providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.


Hop D. T. (12) là 26 tuổi nữ.  Cô ấy sống ở thành phố Thieu D. Thieu Hoa Thanh Hoa.  Hop là trưởng nhóm của nhóm vay gồm có 3 các thành viên.  Mặc dù mỗi thành viên trong nhóm nhận được từng khoản vay cá nhân, nhưng tất cả họ đều chịu trách nhiệm hoàn trả lại khoản vay của các thành viên trong nhóm của mình nếu một người nào đó trễ hạn hay không trả được nợ..  Tên chính thức của nhóm vay này là 25 (02.09.25).


Trong khi không phải chỉ có các phương thức tạo nên thu nhập, mà nguồn thu nhập chính của công việc kinh doanh chủ yếu từ chăn nuôi gia súc để bán.  Hop thực hiện công việc kinh doanh này trong hơn 5 năm.  Từ các hoạt động này, Hop kiếm được khoảng 2.500.000 VND.  Vào 2010, Hop đã tham gia Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women để có thể tiếp cận với các dịch vụ tài chính giúp cải T.ện  sinh hoạt và khả năng tham gia vào các hoạt động kinh doanh của cô ấy/ anh ấy.  Hop đã hoàn trả hết khoản vay trước đây từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.    Cô ấy hiện đang đề nghị một khoản vay mới là 5.787.900 VND.


Khoản vay sẽ là 12th khoản vay của người vay từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.


Về Những Người vay khác trong Nhóm:


1.  T. T. Hoa (11) là 39 tuổi nữ.  Cô ấy đề nghị khoản vay là 5.787.900 VND.  Khoản vay này sẽ được sử dụng để hỗ trợ công việc kinh doanh trong lĩnh vực nông nghiệp.  Mục đích chính của việc kinh doanh là chăn nuôi gia súc.


2.  L. T. Hoa (13) là 26 tuổi nữ.  Cô ấy đề nghị khoản vay là 5.787.900 VND.  Khoản vay này sẽ được sử dụng để hỗ trợ công việc kinh doanh trong lĩnh vực nông nghiệp.  Mục đích chính của việc kinh doanh là chăn nuôi gia súc.


Về Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

Nhiệm vụ của Quỹ vì Phụ Nữ Nghèo Thanh Hóa (FPW) là cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính bền vững cho những người phụ nữ kém may mắn ở các vùng nông thôn tỉnh Thanh Hóa.


*Lưu ý: Để phát huy tối đa hiệu quả & giảm chi phí, khoản vay này đã được thông báo bằng biểu mẫu để có thể được Kiva tự động biên dịch. .  Do việc biên dịch thủ công các danh mục rất tốn kém, nên Kiva đã tạo biểu mẫu này cho phần Field Partner (Trường Đối Tác) cho phép họ tiếp tục thông báo các khoản vay bằng  Vietnamese trong khi cung cấp thông tin có chất lượng & chính xác cho người cho vay Kiva.  ."

loans.use: To purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in the future

loans.name: Fenix Liset

texts.es:
Fénix tiene 29 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres y hermanos en el sector Poste Blanco del distrito de Paiján, una zona comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Ascope y que se encuentra ubicada en la región La Libertad, a más de de dos horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde hace más de dos años a la comercialización de productos de belleza. Ella comercializa los productos a pedidos entre sus vecinos y conocidos. Constantemente se dedica a buscar nuevos clientes ya que la empresa para la que trabaja le brinda mayores incentivos económicos mientras más productos venda. Adicionalmente trabaja como enfermera particular. Con los ingresos que le brindan estas actividades ella se encarga de solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a sacar adelante la economía de su familia.

Fénix desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos de modo que pueda contar con un stock fijo que le permita satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes sin hacerlos esperar a fin de mes, que es cuando llegan sus pedidos, para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Fénix is 29 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents and siblings in Poste Blanco sector of Paiján district, a commercial area which is located in Ascope province, in La Libertad region, more than two and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Fénix has been selling beauty products for two years.  She sells her products to order, to her neighbors and acquaintances.  She is constantly looking for new customers since the company for which she works provides her with economic incentives according to the quantity of products she sells.

Fénix also works as a private nurse.  She uses her income from these activities to cover her personal expenses and to help her family financially.  Fénix would like to expand her business, acquiring more products so that she can have a fixed stock that will allow her to meet her customers' demands without having to wait until the end of the month when her orders arrive.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To acquire more products so that she can have a fixed stock that will allow her to better meet her customers' demands

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 51 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos, reside junto a su familia en el sector Pilar Nores del distrito de Paiján, una zona comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Ascope y que se encuentra ubicada en la región La Libertad, a más de de dos horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la comercialización de abarrotes en un quiosco ubicado dentro de uno de los mercados más importantes del distrito, ella cuenta con varios años de experiencia en este rubro y siempre se ha esforzado por brindar a sus clientes productos de calidad y un buen servicio. Rosa utiliza los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad para solventar la economía de su familia y sacarlos adelante. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una persona tranquila y bastante responsable. 

Rosa desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayude a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Rosa is 51 years old.  She is the single mother of two children and lives with her family in the Pilar Nores sector of the Paiján district, a commercial zone within the Ascope province and the La Libertad region, located more than two hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital city of Lambayaeque.

She sells groceries from a kiosk in the one of the most important markets in the district.  She has many years experience in this field and always makes an effort to provide quality products and good service to her customers.  Rosa uses the income from this activity to cover her household expenses and move them ahead.  Those who know her consider her to be a very easy going and responsible person.

Rosa wants to expand her business by acquiring more products to satisfy her customer demands, so she has seen fit to request this loan of 1,000 PEN ($375) through Edpyme Alternativa, so that she can reach her objective.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Enma

texts.es:
Enma es una madre de familia de 28 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima semitropical caracterizada por producir principalmente frutas como el mango,la maracuyá y el limón. Pertenece a la región Piura y se encuentra ubicada a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado caprino. Ella posee 30 cabras las cuales cría en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Las alimenta en base a granos y pastos naturales y cuando están gordas las ofrece en venta al público en general y a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde reside. Esta actividad le sirve para ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía familiar.

Enma desea adquirir alimento para mejorar la crianza de sus animales y hacer que estos se desarrollen de mejor manera para que los pueda vender a un mejor precio. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Enma is a 28 year-old mother who lives with her husband and three children in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an area with a semi-tropical climate which is noted for producing fruit such as mango, passion fruit and lemon.  It is located in Piura region which is more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Enma raises and sells goats.  She owns 30 goats which she raises in an area behind her home.  She feeds them grains and natural fodder and when they are fattened she offers them for sale to the general public and to the traders who always visit the area where she lives.  This business allows her to help her husband to support the family financially.

Enma would like to acquire feed so that she can improve the raising of her animals and help them to develop in the best way possible so that she can sell them for a better price.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To acquire feed to improve the raising of her animals so that they develop in the best way possible

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
Teodora tiene 32 años de edad, es madre soltera y reside junto a sus dos hijos en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima semitropical caracterizada por producir principalmente frutas como el mango,la maracuyá y el limón. Pertenece a la región Piura y se encuentra ubicada a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales. Ella cría ovejas, cerdos y aves de corral en su domicilio. Los alimenta en base a granos y pastos naturales y cuando han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general y a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde reside. Adicionalmente trabaja como obrera agrícola en un fundo de la zona especializado en el cultivo de maracuyá. Los ingresos que le brindan estas actividades le sirven para sacar adelante la economía de su familia.

Teodora desea adquirir alimento para mejorar la crianza de sus animales y hacer que estos se desarrollen de mejor manera para que los pueda vender a un mejor precio. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 700 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Teodora is 32 years old.  She is a single mother and lives together with her two children in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an area with a semi-tropical climate which is noted for producing fruit such as mango, passion fruit and lemons.  It is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Teodora raises and sells animals.  She raises sheep, pigs and poultry from her home.  She feeds her animals grains and natural fodder and when they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale to the general public and the traders who always visit the area where she lives.

Teodora also works as an agricultural laborer on a large farm in the area which specializes in growing passion fruit.  The income that she makes from these activities allows her to get her family ahead financially.  Teodora would like to acquire feed so that she can better raise her animals and ensure that they develop as well as possible so that she can sell them for a better price.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 700 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To acquire feed to better raise her animals

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre de familia de 35 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima semitropical caracterizada por producir principalmente frutas como el mango,la maracuyá y el limón. Pertenece a la región Piura y se encuentra ubicada a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y conocidos diversos productos de uso diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. Rosa siempre trata de brindarle a sus clientes productos de buena calidad y un trato amable con lo cual se ha asegurado una clientela fidelizada durante el tiempo que lleva funcionando su negocio.

Rosa desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos, de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda con la que cuenta, por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 35 year-old mother who lives together with her husband and three children in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an area with a semi-tropical climate which is noted for producing fruit such as mango, passion fruit and lemons.  It is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Rosa has a small grocery stall in her home.  There she offers her neighbors and acquaintances different daily-use products, essentials and groceries.  Rosa always tries to provide her customers with good-quality products and good customer service.  This has ensured her a loyal customer base over the time that her business has been operating.

Rosa would like to expand her business, acquiring more products so that she can meet her customers' demands.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will help her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To expand her business by acquiring more products

loans.name: Natalina

texts.es:
Natalina tiene 51 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el distrito agrícola D. TambogranD., una zona D. clima semitropical caracterizada por producir principalmente frutas como el mango,la maracuyá y el limón. Pertenece a la región Piura y se encuentra ubicada a más D. cuatro horas D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización D. ganado ovino y vacuno. Ella cría sus animales en la parte posterior D. su domicilio. Los alimenta en base a granos y pastos naturales y cuando están gordos los ofrece en venta al público en general y a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donD. resiD.. Adicionalmente comercializa la leche que producen sus vacas con un acopiador D. la zona. Esta actividad le sirve para ayudar a su esposo, que es agricultor, con el sostenimiento D. la economía familiar.

Natalina desea adquirir alimento para mejorar la crianza D. sus animales y hacer que estos se desarrollen D. mejor manera para que pueda obtener una buena producción y obtener mejores ganancias. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Natalina is 51 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and three children in the agricultural district of TambogranD., an area with a semi-tropical climate which is noted for producing fruit such as mango, passion fruit and lemons.  It is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Natalina raises and sells sheep and cows.  She raises her animals in an area behind her home.  She feeds them grains and natural fodder and, when they are fattened, she sells them to the general public and to the traders who always visit the area where she lives.  Natalina also sells the milk that her cows produce to a middleman in the area.  This business allows her to help her husband, who is a farmer, to financially support their family.

Natalina would like to acquire animal feed.  This will enable her to better raise her animals so that they can develop in the best way possible and she can make more profits from them.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To acquire animal feed to improve her animal raising business

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana es una madre de familia de 26 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus dos  hijos en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima semitropical caracterizada por producir principalmente frutas como el mango,la maracuyá y el limón. Pertenece a la región Piura y se encuentra ubicada a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y conocidos diversos productos de uso diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. Roxana siempre trata de brindarle a sus clientes productos de buena calidad y un trato amable con lo cual se ha asegurado una clientela fidelizada durante el tiempo que lleva funcionando su negocio. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, los ingresos que ella percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Roxana desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos, de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda con la que cuenta, por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Roxana is a 26 year-old mother who lives together with her husband and two children in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an area with a semi-tropical climate which is noted for producing fruit such as mango, passion fruit and lemons.  It is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Roxana has a small grocery store in her home.  She offers her neighbors and acquaintances a range of daily-use products, essentials and groceries.  Roxana always tries to provide her customers with good-quality products and good customer service which has gained her a loyal customer base over the time that she has been running her business.

Roxana also raises and sells young animals.  She uses the income that she makes from this business to help her husband with their family finances.  Roxana would like to expand her business, acquiring more products so that she can meet her customers' demands.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to help her achieve her goal.

loans.use: To expand her business, acquiring more products

loans.name: 26 Thieu Hoa Group

texts.en:
Sam L. T. (39) is a 67-year-old femaL. living in the town of Thieu D. Thieu Hoa Thanh Hoa.  Sam is the group leader of a three-member group loan offered by Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  WhiL. each member of the group receives an individual loan, they all are responsibL. for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults.  The official name of this borrowing group is 26 Thieu D. Thieu Hoa(09.09.26 Thieu Hoa).


Sam is married and has three adult children. To make a living, Sam operates a family member's business venture raising cattL. for saL..  Sam has been engaged in this business for over 20 years and earns approximately 2,000,000 VND a month from these activities.


In 2010, Sam joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  Sam is requesting for the first time a loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  She is now requesting a new loan of 5,787,900 VND, which will be used to purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in the future.  The loan will be the 12th loan taken out by Sam from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Sam plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business.


About the Other Borrowers in the Group:


1.  D. T. Phuong (40) is a 36-year-old femaL. who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


2.  L. T. Hoi (41) is a 45-year-old femaL. who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


About Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

The mission of Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW) is to provide sustainabL. financial services to disadvantaged women in rural areas in the Thanh Hoa province.


*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in Vietnamese whiL. providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.


Sam L. T. (39) là 67 tuổi nữ.  Cô ấy sống ở thành phố Thieu D. Thieu Hoa Thanh Hoa.  Sam là trưởng nhóm của nhóm vay gồm có 3 các thành viên.  Mặc dù mỗi thành viên trong nhóm nhận được từng khoản vay cá nhân, nhưng tất cả họ đều chịu trách nhiệm hoàn trả lại khoản vay của các thành viên trong nhóm của mình nếu một người nào đó trễ hạn hay không trả được nợ..  Tên chính thức của nhóm vay này là 26 Thieu D. Thieu Hoa (09.09.26 Thieu Hoa).


Trong khi không phải chỉ có các phương thức tạo nên thu nhập, mà nguồn thu nhập chính của công việc kinh doanh chủ yếu từ chăn nuôi gia súc để bán.  Sam thực hiện công việc kinh doanh này trong hơn 20 năm.  Từ các hoạt động này, Sam kiếm được khoảng 2.000.000 VND.  Vào 2010, Sam đã tham gia Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women để có thể tiếp cận với các dịch vụ tài chính giúp cải T.ện  sinh hoạt và khả năng tham gia vào các hoạt động kinh doanh của cô ấy/ anh ấy.  Sam đã hoàn trả hết khoản vay trước đây từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.    Cô ấy hiện đang đề nghị một khoản vay mới là 5.787.900 VND.


Khoản vay sẽ là 12th khoản vay của người vay từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.


Về Những Người vay khác trong Nhóm:


1.  D. T. Phuong (40) là 36 tuổi nữ.  Cô ấy đề nghị khoản vay là 5.787.900 VND.  Khoản vay này sẽ được sử dụng để hỗ trợ công việc kinh doanh trong lĩnh vực nông nghiệp.  Mục đích chính của việc kinh doanh là chăn nuôi gia súc.


2.  L. T. Hoi (41) là 45 tuổi nữ.  Cô ấy đề nghị khoản vay là 5.787.900 VND.  Khoản vay này sẽ được sử dụng để hỗ trợ công việc kinh doanh trong lĩnh vực nông nghiệp.  Mục đích chính của việc kinh doanh là chăn nuôi gia súc.


Về Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

Nhiệm vụ của Quỹ vì Phụ Nữ Nghèo Thanh Hóa (FPW) là cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính bền vững cho những người phụ nữ kém may mắn ở các vùng nông thôn tỉnh Thanh Hóa.


*Lưu ý: Để phát huy tối đa hiệu quả & giảm chi phí, khoản vay này đã được thông báo bằng biểu mẫu để có thể được Kiva tự động biên dịch. .  Do việc biên dịch thủ công các danh mục rất tốn kém, nên Kiva đã tạo biểu mẫu này cho phần Field Partner (Trường Đối Tác) cho phép họ tiếp tục thông báo các khoản vay bằng  Vietnamese trong khi cung cấp thông tin có chất lượng & chính xác cho người cho vay Kiva.  ."

loans.use: To purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in the future

loans.name: David Gutu

texts.en:
David, age 43 years old, is married to Mary Wanjiku who is a farmer. Together they have five children between 5 and 17 years old. He sells timber for building in Kimende and its environment. David was introduced to KADET LTD by a friend. He has been running this business for 10 years. 

This is the fifth loan he is getting from KADET and he intends to add more stock of timber so that he can increase his monthly sales. If the loan improves the business, he intends to buy a plot of land to build a timber yard.

He hopes to give his children a better education and a comfortable life.

loans.use: To buy more timber

loans.name: Jackson Turpesio

texts.en:
Jackson Turpesio, age 27, runs a motorcycle transport business at Bissil, which is a very busy market. He is married to Mary, age 20, and together they have one child, Naserian, age four. Jackson was introduced to KADET LTD by the credit officer in charge of the Kitengela office.

Jackson has been running this business for a period of eight years and his monthly profit is Kshs 4,000. This loan of Kshs 15,000 is his first loan from KADET and he intends to use the loan to buy spare parts for his motorbike. If this loan boosts the business, he will buy another motorbike.

Jackson dreams of starting a motorbike transport company, buying many motorbikes and employing many people. He describes himself as hardworking.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his motorbike.

loans.name: 27.thieu Duong. Thieu Hoa Group

texts.en:
Dung M. T. (21) is a 40-year-old female living in the town of Thieu D. Thieu Hoa Thanh Hoa.  Dung is the group leader of a five-member group loan offered by Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  While each member of the group receives an individual loan, they all are responsible for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults.  The official name of this borrowing group is 27 Thieu D. Thieu Hoa (17.09.27 Thieu Hoa).


Dung is married and has three school-aged children.  To make a living, Dung operates a family member's business raising cattle for sale.  Dung has been engaged in this business for over 20 years and earns approximately 2,000,000 VND a month from these activities.


In 2010, Dung joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  Dung is requesting for the first time a loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is now requesting a new loan of 5,787,900 VND which will be used to purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in the future.  The loan will be the 12th loan taken out by Dung from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Dung plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business.


About the Other Borrowers in the Group:


1.  N. T. Tinh (19) is a 59-year-old female who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


2.  D. T. Tinh (22) is a 46-year-old female who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


3.  N. T. Chung (20) is a 54-year-old female who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


4.  D. T. Thanh (23) is a 26-year-old female who is requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business raising livestock.


About Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

The mission of Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW) is to provide sustainable financial services to disadvantaged women in rural areas in the Thanh Hoa province.

Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in Vietnamese while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

Trong khi không phải chỉ có các phương thức tạo nên thu nhập, mà nguồn thu nhập chính của công việc kinh doanh chủ yếu từ chăn nuôi gia súc để bán.  Dung thực hiện công việc kinh doanh này trong hơn 20 năm.  Từ các hoạt động này, Dung kiếm được khoảng 2.000.000 VND.  Vào 2010, Dung đã tham gia Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women để có thể tiếp cận với các dịch vụ tài chính giúp cải T.ện  sinh hoạt và khả năng tham gia vào các hoạt động kinh doanh của cô ấy/ anh ấy.  Dung đã hoàn trả hết khoản vay trước đây từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.    Cô ấy hiện đang đề nghị một khoản vay mới là 5.787.900 VND.


Khoản vay sẽ là 12th khoản vay của người vay từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.


Về Những Người vay khác trong Nhóm:

4.  D. T. Thanh (23) là 26 tuổi nữ.  Cô ấy đề nghị khoản vay là 5.787.900 VND.  Khoản vay này sẽ được sử dụng để hỗ trợ công việc kinh doanh trong lĩnh vực nông nghiệp.  Mục đích chính của việc kinh doanh là chăn nuôi gia súc.


Về Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

Nhiệm vụ của Quỹ vì Phụ Nữ Nghèo Thanh Hóa (FPW) là cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính bền vững cho những người phụ nữ kém may mắn ở các vùng nông thôn tỉnh Thanh Hóa.


*Lưu ý: Để phát huy tối đa hiệu quả & giảm chi phí, khoản vay này đã được thông báo bằng biểu mẫu để có thể được Kiva tự động biên dịch. . loans.use: To purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in future

loans.name: Charbel

texts.en: Charbel is a 43-year-old married man and father of one kid. Charbel has owned a restaurant since Jan 2010, with 15 years of experience in this field. Charbel made a good step by opening his own business in this unstable political and financial situation. His restaurant is located in an important tourist region, where clients visit him from different regions every day.  Charbel is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua in order to pay for some of the restaurant furniture such as refrigerators, chairs and tables. Charbel hopes to expand his business to an important and successful chain business and hopes his family will be satisfied with what they get.

loans.use: To pay for the restaurant furniture

loans.name: John Ekai

texts.en:
John Ekai A. is 44 years old and married to Amanikor Mon who is a housewife. They have four school-going children aged 18, 14, 9 and 5 years old. They live in Lodwar, Kenya. He is selling camels. He has been in this business for 13 years and earns a monthly profit of KES. 23,000. Lodwar is in the northern part of Kenya about 700 kilometers from Nairobi, the capital city. It's a very dry place and most animals that survive this condition are camels.


John learned about KADET LTD through a credit officer and he is applying for his second loan of KES. 70,000 from KADET LTD, which he intends to use to buy more animals to sell. With the anticipated profits, he plans to expand the business.


In the future, John wishes to have an animal farm. His deeper desire is to see his children realize their goals in life through better education.

loans.use: To buy more animals to sell

loans.name: 20.09.28. Thieu Duong. Thieu Hoa Group

texts.en:
Quy N. T. (18) is a 55 year-old femaL. living in the town of Thieu D. Thieu Hoa Thanh Hoa. Quy is the leader of a seven-member group loan offered by Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. WhiL. each member of the group receives an individual loan, they are all responsibL. for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults. The official name of this borrowing group is 28 (20.09.28).

Quy is married and has five adult children. To making a living, Quy operates a family business in the agriculture sector raising livestock. The main source of income for the business comes from raising cattL. for saL.. Quy has been engaged in this business for over 30 years and earns approximately 1,500,000 VND a month from these activities.

In 2010, Quy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Quy is requesting her first loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is requesting a loan of 5,787,900 VND which will be used to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future. This will be her 12th loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Quy plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

About the other borrowers in the group:

1.  N. T. quy (18) is a 55 year-old femaL. requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business in the agriculture sector raising livestock.

2.  D. T. hanh (23) is a 42 year-old femaL. requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business in the agriculture sector raising livestock.

3.  L. T. thuy (22) is a 27 year-old femaL. requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business in the agriculture sector raising livestock.

4.  D. T. phong (19) is a 62 year-old femaL. requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business in the agriculture sector raising livestock.

5.  L. T. sam (21) is a 21 year-old femaL. requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business in the food sector making and selling food.

6.  L. T. phuong (20) is a 20 year-old femaL. requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business in the food sector making and selling food.

7.  L. T. lan (24) is a 24 year-old femaL. requesting a 5,787,900 VND loan to support her business in the food sector making and selling food.

About the Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women: The mission of the Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women (FPW) is to provide sustainabL. financial services to disadvantaged women in rural areas of the Thanh Hoa province.

loans.use: To purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Zakayo Erot

texts.en:
Zakayo Erot E. is 26 years old and married to Juddy Lotoom, a housewife. They have one school-going child aged 10. They live in Lodwar, Kenya. Zakayo operates a retail shop and has been in this business for four years. He earns a monthly profit of 12,000 KES.
Zakayo learnt about Kiva partner, KADET, through a credit officer. He is applying for a second loan of 50,000 KES, which he intends to use to buy three bags of sugar, five boxes of cooking oil and three boxes of washing powder. With the anticipated profits, he plans to expand his shop business. In the future, Zakayo wishes to have a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy sugar, cooking oil and washing powder

loans.name: Wangoi Naiteyeyo

texts.en:
Wangoi Naiteyeyo is 54 years old and married to Raphael, 60, who is a livestock farmer. Together, they have three grown-up children – Joel, a businessman (aged 32); Naisula, a teacher (aged 30); Jackson, in college (aged 26).
Wangoi trades livestock at Bissil market in Kajiado. She was introduced to Kiva partner, KADET, by the credit officer in charge of Kitengela office. She has been in the livestock business for a period of one year and her monthly profit is 4,000 KES. She has applied for her first loan of 15,000 KES from KADET, which she intends to use to purchase goats for resale. If her loan boosts her business, Wangoi will start a big dairy farm. She describes herself as hardworking and focused.

loans.use: To buy livestock for resale

loans.name: 0307013 Tay Xuan Vi -Hoang Hoa Group

texts.en:
Nghiem C. T. (307013083) is a 62-year-old female living in the town of Hoang hoa. Nghiem is the group leader of a four-member group loan offered by Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. While each member of the group receives an individual loan, they all are responsible for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults. The official name of this borrowing group is 0307013 Tay xuan vi -Hoang Hoa (0307013 Tay xuan vi -Hoang Hoa).
Nghiem is widowed and has four adult-aged children. To make a living, Nghiem operates a family member's business venture in the retail sector running a general store. The main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling both food and daily use products in the local community. Nghiem has been engaged in this business for over 15 years and earns approximately 2,000,000 VND per month from these activities.
In 2010, Nghiem joined Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She is now requesting a new loan of 3,079,800 VND, which will be used to invest in expanding the business. The loan will be her first from Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Nghiem plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

About the other borrowers in the group
1. N. T. Loi (84) is a 30-year-old female who is requesting a 3,079,800 VND loan to support her service-based business. 2. L. T. Thuy (85) is a 33-year-old female who is requesting a 3,079,800 VND loan to support her service-based business. 3. D. T. Hong (86) is a 30-year-old female who is requesting a 3,079,800 VND loan to support her service-based business.

About Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women
The mission of Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW) is to provide sustainable financial services to disadvantaged women in rural areas in the Thanh Hoa province.
